title: Can we use gaming laptop for video (editing, database, etc.)? What are advantages and disadvantages of buying gaming laptop? Why is the gaming laptop so heavier? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gaming laptops are best for everything. Any work can be done flawlessly with a gaming laptop. Disadvantages are, Heavy and BulkyLarge battery but small battery usage time than under powered laptopsOn the expensive sideRepairs are expensiveEats a lot of electricity etc…Advantages are, They are super powerfulFuture Proof hardwareMost of them have backlight keyboardsGood sounding speakersSometimes high refresh rate displaysSturdy build etc…Gaming laptops heats up when playing intensive games. So they need large heat spreader and fans. They also need more components than normal laptops. With so much power, they also need large batteries. These all add up for their bulkyness and heavyness.

Gaming laptop is good for everything. Most gaming laptops are about the same weight as any other laptop of the same screen size. If you are comparing 14″ laptop with 15.6″ laptop in weight, you are simply being absurd. 14″ screen does not have big enough screen or numpad which makes it really different from 15.6″ ones. I never use 14″ laptop as I find it stressful to my eyes and I need numpad. So, if you compare similar sized laptops, there is no real disadvantage of gaming laptops. Even battery life can be extended by buying bigger battery laptops like ASUS TUF A15 with 90Whr battery and also by using the default software of fan control to undervolt.
